Job Description: Job Description     Works with Software Architects, Product Managers, product developers, subject matter experts and others on system architecture and interface development.   Develops new functionality as required by product marketing and development management as designed by architects.   Participate in the implementation of solutions that will improve the current product performance, quality, processes and standards.   Ensure quality code is checked in to avoid broken builds that can cause delays to the team.   Understands test driven development. Writes unit, regression, load and stress tests to verify software programs. Prepares any test data required.
